title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to this Quarto website. The goal is to demonstrate professional formatting using text, lists, images, equations, and diagrams. 1 2
Roman economic and social structures shaped much of Europe’s development [@garnsey2015roman].
Later interpretations of decline provide valuable historical lessons [@gibbon2003decline].

title: Welcome
text:
Subsection B
Inline equation example:

title: Roman Empire Insights
text:
Historical Context
The Roman Empire provides a foundation for much of European history [@garnsey2015roman].

Economy shaped trade
Society structured governance
Culture influenced philosophy


Roman Map

title: Roman Empire Insights
text:
Legacy
Interpretations of decline continue to influence modern thought [@gibbon2003decline].

title: Roman Empire Insights
text:
Interpretation
The roman empire was a rich state and had great influence over the world.
